alert.note: Alert for Clark; Ford; Gray; Hodgeman; Meade (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 26 at 5:08PM CST until February 26 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Ford County in southwestern Kansas... Southwestern Hodgeman County in southwestern Kansas... Meade County in southwestern Kansas... Gray County in southwestern Kansas... Western Clark County in southwestern Kansas... * Until 600 PM CST. * At 508 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Pierceville to near Floris, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Charleston around 515 PM CST. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Meade State Park and Minneola. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CST for southwestern Kansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CST for southwestern Kansas.
